cards.name: Embiggen
cards.description:
Embiggen a card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Side Effects
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, add a random Status to your draw pile.

relics.name: Wisdom of the Giants
relics.description: At the start of combat, choose 1 embiggened card to add to your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: How wise were they, really? They're extinct.

relics.name: Magnifying Glass
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 2 cards in your deck to embiggen.
